# Otoniq AI

> Industrial automation AI consulting company based in Amman, Jordan. We combine Siemens PLC/SCADA engineering expertise with artificial intelligence to deliver smart factory solutions, AI-powered documentation, and industrial process optimization for the Middle East and worldwide.

Otoniq AI bridges the gap between traditional industrial automation (PLC, SCADA, HMI) and modern AI. Founded by a PLC/SCADA systems engineer with hands-on experience in Siemens TIA Portal projects for the water sector, we bring real plant-floor knowledge to AI solutions â€” not just software theory.

We serve industrial companies, system integrators, and manufacturers across Jordan, Saudi Arabia, UAE, Qatar, Kuwait, and globally. Services available in English and Arabic.

## Services

- [Industrial AI Consulting](https://otoniqai.com/#services): Strategic AI consulting for manufacturing, water treatment, and industrial operations. We assess your existing PLC/SCADA infrastructure and identify where AI adds real value.
- [AI-Powered PLC Documentation](https://otoniqai.com/products/documenter): Automatic documentation generation from PLC program files using AI. Upload Rockwell L5X files, get complete documentation with cross-references and plain-English descriptions.
- [Smart Factory Solutions](https://otoniqai.com/#services): AI-driven SCADA dashboards, intelligent alarm management, predictive maintenance, and industrial process optimization.
- [Workflow & CRM Automation](https://otoniqai.com/#services): Business process automation, CRM integration, and AI-powered sales automation for industrial and B2B companies.

## Products

- [PLC Documenter](https://otoniqai.com/products/documenter): Free AI-powered tool that parses PLC program files (Rockwell L5X, Siemens TIA Portal coming soon) and generates complete documentation with cross-references, tag mappings, and AI-written descriptions for every routine.
